sentence.Network_en: American humor is founded largely on hyperbole.
sentence.Network_cn: 美式幽默主要以夸张为基础.

sentence.Network_en: The phrase is of course a hyperbole.
Prochazka loved to regale his friends with hyperbole and excess.
sentence.Network_cn: 普罗恰兹卡喜欢用夸张、过激的话与朋友逗乐.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 夸张 (Hyperbole)       夸张是一种故意言过其实，或夸大或缩小事物的形象，借以突出事物的某种特征或品格，鲜明地表达思想情感的修辞.
英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... hypercritical 吹毛求疵的 hyperbole 夸张法 hypertension 过度紧张；高血压.
“增”者，修辞所谓夸饰（hyperbole）；亦《史通》所谓“施之文章则可，用于简策则否”者。由是观之，古人有诗心而缺史德。
作为一种夸张手法（hyperbole）,就是很多钱或啊fortune的意思。所以，就成了“花不了您多少钱”或“花不了您太多钱”的意思了。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: via Latin from Greek huperbolē (see hyperbola)

entry.def: If someone uses hyperbole, they say or write things that make something sound much more impressive than it really is.

example.ex: ...the hyperbole that portrays him as one of the greatest visionaries in the world.
example.tran: 将他描绘成世界上最伟大的愿景家之一的夸张

auth_sentence.content: It deserves as much hyperbole as it can get.
auth_sentence.res_content: It deserves as much hyperbole as it can get.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It deserves as much hyperbole as it can get.

auth_sentence.content: Shrillness and hyperbole too often cloud the European debate.
auth_sentence.res_content: Shrillness and hyperbole too often cloud the European debate.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Shrillness and hyperbole too often cloud the European debate.

auth_sentence.content: Yes, you are right, that was my hyperbole.
auth_sentence.res_content: Yes, you are right, that was my hyperbole.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Yes, you are right, that was my hyperbole.

stems_affixes.word_buile: mata变+bol抛+ism行为,现象→抛[旧]变新
sym共同+bol抛→共同抛出的标志→象征
symbol[n.符号,象征]+ize表动词→v.用符号表示;象征
hyper超过,太多+active活动的→adj.活动过度的
hyper超过,太多+critical批评的→adj.吹毛求疵的
hyper超过,太多+sensitive敏感的→adj.过敏的
hyper超过,太多+bol抛+e→活抛得高→夸张
hyper超过,太多+tension紧张→n.过度紧张;高血压
